title: ASOBO_material_iridescent glTF extension
description: Define a material with a iridescent layer effect.

iridescentThicknessTexture.description: Optionnal texture used to determine the thickness of the iridescent layer on the surface. It affect the way of the gradient of the iridescent is show.

iridescentMinThickness.description: Controls the minimal thickness of the iridescent layer.

iridescentMaxThickness.description: Controls the maximum thickness of the iridescent layer.

iridescentBrightness.description: Controls the brightness of the apparent iridescent effect.
